text:
Hey guys,

Is there anyway to pull attachments from custom objects in pages?

We are able to pull custom object data in pages but having issue in fetching attachments that we will upload in this highlighted section

Hi folks, I’ve got a simple question. How would I show another Text field if a Boolean field is set to true? Thanks!

For example, if the “Show Hero Button” boolean is true, then display a Text field to change the button’s text
:wave: Hello. Is there a way to disable some fields in the *Rich Text Editor*, such that a content creator/manager cannot change font size or font colour? See attached image: :point_down:
